sent.orig: From the back. I'm sure everyone knows this. It has the Honda City's rear look.
sent.trans: 从后面看，我相信大家都认识——本田City的尾部。

sent.orig: City National Excellent Tourism City, the national garden city.
sent.trans: 晋城市是全国优秀旅游城市、国家级园林城市。

sent.orig: City as one of the city center, sharing the city's labor resources, rich labor resources.
sent.trans: 作为城市中心城区之一，劳动力资源全市共享，劳动力资源比较丰富。

sent.orig: In Le City city streets, city 250 kilometers away from Guangzhou, 45 km from Shaoguan.
sent.trans: 市政府驻乐城街道，市区距离广州250公里，距离韶关45公里。

sent.orig: Helü City was magnificent by consisting of three city walls: outer citycity wall and city wall.
sent.trans: 阖闾城由外廓、大城和小城三套城垣组成，规模宏大。
